WorkItem.Description: I suggest that you add to the end of the tutorial content about how to deploy website at IIS.

Comments.Message: Great idea. Will either include directly in the tutorial or as an addon.

Yes.  I have had some issues deploying this to my hosting provider.  Any help would be appreciated.  It works locally in IIS, but once I put it on the server, I keep getting 404 not found errors.  Trying to work through them, but I'm stuck at this point.  I'm also having problems with the images not being displayed.  If you added content for deployment, I would be very grateful.  Seems like there are a bunch of issues deploying MVC3 applications to hosting providers.
